section.title: Details
section.p: 将客户端的所有日志文件上传至声网服务器。 After calling this method successfully, the SDK triggers the callback to report whether the log file is successfully uploaded to the Agora server.
Do not call this method more than once per minute; otherwise, the SDK reports ERR_TOO_OFTEN(12)..

p.note: This method cannot be called more than once per minute; otherwise, the SDK returns .

section.p: For easier debugging, Agora recommends that you bind the uploadLogFile method to the UI element of your app, to instruct the user to upload a log file when a quality issue occurs.

pd.p: The request ID. The request ID is the same as the requestId in the callback. You can use the requestId to match a specific upload with a callback.

section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown; you need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly.

ul.li:
< 0: Failure.
-12(ERR_TOO_OFTEN): The call frequency exceeds the limit.
The method call succeeds: Return the request ID. The request ID is the same as the requestId in the callback. You can use requestId to match a specific upload with a callback.
The method callI fails: Returns . Probably because the method call frequency exceeds the limit.
